timeline.message: Added Beta warning text to the APIs
Updated Warning text on all Beta APIs
Updated versions for release azure-cosmos 4.9.0 and azure-spring-data-cosmos 3.2.0
Added beta tags to Transactional Batch APIs

timeline.bodyText:
Set<URI> CosmosDiagnostics.getRegionsContacted()
I might have missed this earlier in the PR.
two comments:

For CosmosClientBuilder.endpoint(String) we pass the endpoint as String not URI, but in the above newly added API we return the endpoint as URI. seems inconsistent to me.
For other apis when we return a collection we return Iterable not Set.

Can we tag this new API with Beta annotation for now. So if we can have the option of changing it later?
timeline.author: moderakh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,11 +1,21 @@
 ## Release History
 
-## 4.9.0-beta.1 (Unreleased)
+### 4.9.0 (2020-12-11)
+#### New Features
+* Added Beta API for Bulk Operations.
+* Added `getRegionsContacted` API in `CosmosDiagnostics`.

replies.bodyText: Makes sense, will add the beta annotation to it.
replies.author: kushagraThapar

timeline.message: Added beta tag to getRegionsContacted API
